Q_NAME: Function returning  multiple values using pointers
Q_DESC:
This program asks the user to enter how many Fibonacci numbers he/she wants to display on the screen. Your have to make a function called 'fibo' of return type integer pointer that accepts one integer as an argument (the number the user entered). The function should have an integer array of size 'n' (the argument of the function). 

Calculate the Fibonacci numbers and store in the array. At the end, simply return the array.
